experience.title: Experience
experience.antexia.name: Antexia Technologies S.L.
experience.antexia.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experience.antexia.description: Researcher in the field of computer vision, focusing on the development of imaging algorithms and the generation and deployment of pipelines for processing video streams.
experience.gradiant.name: Gradiant
experience.gradiant.title: Machine Learning Researcher
experience.gradiant.description:
Researcher in the field of computer vision, focusing on the development of image algorithms for detection, classification and segmentation. As well as the implementation and deployment of the same.

Development of applications and APIs for the management and interaction of the models.

Leadership in best practice methodologies and in the coordination of AI infrastructures for the different projects.
experience.coremain.name: Coremain
experience.coremain.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.coremain.description: Development of web applications with Angular and Typescript and APIs in .NET for the management of data and the automation of processes.
education.title: Education
education.teis.name: IES Teis
education.teis.title: Specialisation course in Artificial Intelligence and Big Data
education.teis.description:
In the AI part we focus on the study, learning and implementation of different models of classic Machine learning and Deep learning.

In Big Data we focus on data management and control tools such as Hadoop and Spark and data visualisation tools such as Tableau and PowerBI.
education.leliadoura.name: IES Leliadoura
education.leliadoura.title: Multiplatform Application Development
education.leliadoura.description:
cross-platform application development, with a special focus on backend applications.

During the training cycle I learned to develop web applications, mobile applications with Java and Android Studio and backend applications with Java, using SpringBoot and AJAX. In addition, I learned to work with relational and non-relational databases.

Degree: Honours.
education.uva.name: University of Valladolid
education.uva.title: Degree in Physics
education.uva.description: Unfinished. I studied the first three years of the degree in Physics, with a focus on theoretical physics.
